The image shows a poster from Ireland: s Health Services (HSE) that reads: "Is your neighbour wearing a mask? If not, report."
The HSE logo can be seen in the poster: s bottom right-hand corner, and the poster mimics the health authority's typeface, layout, and Covid-19 advice symbol.
Ireland: s Health Services confirmed that the photo is not a HSE sign/message and provided a link to a publicly available list of their issued posters, none of which match the one featured in the Facebook post.
